'''Yarze''' ({{lang-ar|يرزة}}) is a village in [[Baabda District]] southeast of [[Beirut]] in [[Lebanon]].
The headquarters of the [[Lebanese Ministry of Defense]] is located in Yarze.<ref>"[http://www.lebarmy.gov.lb/English/Address.asp Address]."{{sic}} Ministry of National Defense. Retrieved on 3 March 2013. "Ministry of Defense Lebanese Armed Forces Yarzeh, Lebanon" - [http://www.lebarmy.gov.lb/Arabic/Address.asp Arabic]: "وزارة الدفاع الوطني الجيش اللبناني اليرزة، لبنان" - [http://www.lebarmy.gov.lb/French/Address.asp French]: "Ministère de la Défense Nationale l’Armée Libanaise Yarzé, Liban"</ref> This facility includes the [[Lebanese Military Museum]]. The city also has the famous [[Hope for Peace Monument]] designed and gifted to Lebanon in 1995 by [[Arman]]. <ref>[http://www.arman-studio.com/catalogues/catalogue_accumulation/arman_acc_espoir.html Image of ''Hope for Peace'']</ref>
